comment: An equality theorem for nonfreeness. See ~ nfbidf for a version without disjoint variable condition but requiring more axioms. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-6 , ~ ax-7 , ~ ax-12 by adapting proof of ~ nfbidf . (Revised by BJ, 25-Sep-2022.)
